DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance GORE EXCLUDER® Bifurcated Endoprosthesis-Low Permeability primary treatment infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: GORE EXCLUDER® Endoprosthesis - Low Permeability Treatment Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms
DOC.criteria: 1 . Infrarenal Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms le 4.5 cm diameter 2 . Anatomy meet EXCLUDER Bifurcated Endoprosthesis Low Permeability specification criterion per Instructions Use 3 . Access vessel able receive 18 French introducer sheath 4 . Life expectancy > 2 year 5 . Appropriate candidate endovascular repair 6 . Ability comply protocol requirement include followup 7 . 21 year age old , male infertile female** 1 . Mycotic rupture aneurysm 2 . Participating another investigational device drug study within one year 3 . Documented history drug abuse within six month 4 . Myocardial infarction cerebral vascular accident within six week 5 . Pulmonary insufficiency require chronic home oxygen inability ambulate due pulmonary function 6 . Iliac anatomy would require occlusion internal iliac artery 7 . Planned occlusion reimplantation significant mesenteric renal artery 8 . Planned concomitant surgical procedure previous major surgery within 30 day 9 . Previous prosthesis placement aorta iliac artery 10 . Degenerative connective tissue disease ( e.g. , Marfan 's Ehlers Danlos Syndrome )
